name: Time Travel VR
description: Our game is powered by UE4 with exquisite scenes! If you have a time machine, what do you want to do most? Now, try it in the game. Step into the world as it was years ago! Time Travel uses its time machine to send you back in time on an adventure of a lifetime.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64 Bit, Windows 8.1 64 Bit, Windows 8 64 Bit, Windows 7 64 Bit Service Pack 1 Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (AMD Radeon R9 290) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 7 GB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX 10 compatible Additional Notes: DirectX  and Microsoft Visual C++ 2008 sp1 Redistributable are required
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64 Bit, Windows 8.1 64 Bit, Windows 8 64 Bit, Windows 7 64 Bit Service Pack 1 Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 32 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 20 GB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX 10 compatible Additional Notes: DirectX  and Microsoft Visual C++ 2008 sp1 Redistributable are required
